statements: SELECT user_name, user_location_geo FROM UserLocationARInformation WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM UserLocationARInformation WHERE user_id > 5;
SELECT user_id, user_name FROM UserLocationARInformation WHERE user_location_geo IS NOT NULL;
SELECT user_name, user_ar_environment FROM UserLocationARInformation WHERE user_id < 10;
SELECT * FROM UserLocationARInformation WHERE user_location_geo ST_DISTANCE('POINT(-122.335167 47.592882)', user_location_geo) < 1000;
SELECT user_id, user_name, user_location_geo FROM UserLocationARInformation WHERE user_name = 'John Doe'
SELECT user_name, user_ar_environment FROM UserLocationARInformation WHERE user_location_geo IS NOT NULL
SELECT * FROM UserLocationARInformation ORDER BY user_name DESC
SELECT user_name, user_ar_environment FROM UserLocationARInformation WHERE ST_DISTANCE(user_location_geo, GEOGRAPHY_POINT(-122.335167, 47.592843)) < 1000

SELECT user_id, user_name, user_location_geo, JSON_VALUE(user_ar_environment, '$.environment_type') AS environment_type FROM UserLocationARInformation WHERE JSON_VALUE(user_ar_environment, '$.environment_type') = 'outdoor'
SELECT user_id, user_location FROM ar_user_locations;
SELECT * FROM ar_user_locations;
SELECT information_id, information FROM ar_information;
SELECT user_id, information FROM ar_information WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM ar_information ORDER BY information_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM ar_user_locations WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, ST_AsText(user_location) FROM ar_user_locations WHERE user_id IN (1, 2) ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT information_id, information, user_id FROM ar_information WHERE information LIKE '%example%' AND user_id = 3;
SELECT user_id, ST_Distance(user_location, 'POINT(10 20)') AS distance FROM ar_user_locations WHERE ST_DWithin(user_location, 'POINT(10 20)', 1000) ORDER BY distance;
SELECT * FROM ar_user_locations JOIN ar_information ON ar_user_locations.user_id = ar_information.user_id WHERE ar_information.user_id = 2 ORDER BY ar_user_locations.user_id ASC, information_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_location;
SELECT user_name, user_location FROM user_location WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT user_id, user_name FROM user_location ORDER BY user_name DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(interaction_id) AS total_interactions FROM user_ar_interaction GROUP BY user_id;

SELECT user_name, environment_name, interaction_date FROM user_location INNER JOIN user_ar_interaction ON user_location.user_id = user_ar_interaction.user_id INNER JOIN ar_environment ON user_ar_interaction.environment_id = ar_environment.environment_id ORDER BY interaction_date ASC;
SELECT user_id, user_name, user_location FROM user_location WHERE user_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY user_name DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM ar_environment ORDER BY environment_name ASC;
SELECT user_id, interaction_date FROM user_ar_interaction WHERE interaction_date < '2022-01-01' AND environment_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT environment_id, environment_name FROM ar_environment WHERE environment_description ILIKE '%virtual reality%' AND environment_name <> 'Home';
SELECT user_id, user_name, user_location FROM user_location WHERE ST_DWithin(user_location, 'POINT(10 20)', 1000);
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, location FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT username, location FROM users WHERE ar_enabled = TRUE;
SELECT u.username, lo.location_name, ar.object_name FROM users u JOIN ar_objects ar ON u.location = ar.location_id JOIN locations lo ON ar.location_id = lo.location_id;
SELECT u.username, ua.last_viewed FROM users u JOIN user_ar_objects ua ON u.user_id = ua.user_id ORDER BY ua.last_viewed DESC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, location FROM users WHERE ar_enabled = TRUE;
SELECT user_id, location_name FROM users JOIN locations ON users.location = locations.location_name;
SELECT u.username, o.object_name, ua.last_viewed FROM users u JOIN user_ar_objects ua ON u.user_id = ua.user_id JOIN ar_objects o ON ua.object_id = o.object_id WHERE u.location = 'New York';
SELECT username, COUNT(object_id) AS total_objects FROM users JOIN user_ar_objects ON users.user_id = user_ar_objects.user_id GROUP BY username ORDER BY total_objects DESC;
SELECT * FROM UserLocations;
SELECT user_name, location_lat, location_long FROM UserLocations;
SELECT user_id, user_name FROM UserLocations ORDER BY user_name DESC;
SELECT object_name, object_description FROM ARObjects WHERE object_location_lat > 0;
SELECT user_id, theme_color, font_size FROM UserPreferences WHERE font_size = 16;
SELECT user_name, location_lat, location_long FROM UserLocations WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT object_name, object_description FROM ARObjects WHERE object_location_lat > 40 AND object_location_long < -70;
SELECT user_id, device_type, device_os FROM UserDevice ORDER BY device_type ASC;
SELECT theme_color, font_size FROM UserPreferences WHERE user_id = 3;
SELECT action_type, timestamp FROM UserActions ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
